text: aur agar tumako andesha ho ki (nikaah karake) tum yateem ladakiyon (kee rakharakhaav) mein insaaph na kar sakoge to aur auraton mein apanee marzee ke mavaafik do do aur teen teen aur chaar chaar nikaah karo (phir agar tumhen isaka) andesha ho ki (mutatid) beeviyon mein (bhee) insaaph na kar sakoge to ek hee par iktefa karo ya jo (londee) tumhaaree zar khareed ho (usee par qanaat karo) ye tadabeer beinsaafee na karane kee bahut qareene qayaas hai
